page.title: 20TRELLECH PLAYING FIELD.
page.content: THE PLAYING FIELD IS BEHIND A BLOCK OF TWENTY HOUSES, CALLED ROMAN WAY. ON THE PLAYING FIELD THERE ARE SWINGS, A SLIDE, ROUNDABOUTS, AND A SEE-SAW. WE PLAY TAG ON THE SLIDE WHERE YOU CATCH THE PERSON ON THE SLIDE. WE HAVE A GRASS FIELD WHERE WE CAN PLAY CRICKET AND FOOTBALL. THE CHILDREN OF TRELLECH SCHOOL WHO HAVE UNDERTAKEN THE SURVEY ARE:- WAYNE BROWN,SIMON FUSSELL,PHILIP MILES,STEPHEN SYMES,JOHN WILLIAMS,TOBY WOODS, TOM ROBERTS, JULIE BROWN,HELEN HOLDER,REBECCA HOWLEY,BELINDA MACINTOSH, KEELEY MOON, CHARLOTTE POULTER, KATE WILLIAMS, RACHEL WILLIAMS, SARA WILLIAMS, MICHELE SWANN,HELEN SWANN, MEARA CAVANAGH AGES 7-11 HEADTEACHER: MR.KEITH ROWLANDS,HELPED BY R J SCOTT A PARENT.
